name: Dominos (VR)
description:
For Nordic Game Jam Online 2020 - the theme is "Everyday Magic".

I think the domino art is a great form of everyday magic, taking a commonplace, unassuming object and making fun, interactive art with them that fascinates people. I thought it lent itself very well to this jam's theme.

VR only (Oculus Rift)

Get some inspiration! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ARM42-eorzE

Controls:

Index triggers place the current selected item. 

Press AB/XY to cycle through items on either hand.

Grips will pick up a placed object

Thumbsticks will move and rotate the player. Movement may cause discomfort.

Any donations for this project will go to the NHS.
